data.title: ER/The Chicago Way
data.text:
This article about an episode needs to be expanded with more information.

Please help out by editing it.

The Chicago Way is the nineteenth episode of the fourteenth season of ER, and the three hundred ninth episode overall.

Starring: Goran Visnjic (Dr. Luka Kovac), Maura Tierney (Dr. Abby Lockhart), Mekhi Phifer (Dr. Gregory Pratt), Parminder Nagra (Dr. Neela Rasgotra), John Stamos (Dr. Tony Gates), Linda Cardellini (Nurse Samantha Taggart), Scott Grimes (Dr. Archie Morris)

Special Guest Stars: Steve Buscemi (Art Masterson), David Lyons (Simon Brenner), Sam Jones III (Chaz Pratt), Leland Orser (Dr. Lucien Dubenko)

with John Aylward (Dr. Donald Anspaugh)

and Stanley Tucci (Dr. Kevin Moretti)

Guest Starring: Michael Gaston (Rick), Liza Lapira (Christine), J.P. Manoux (Dr. Dustin Crenshaw), Laura Cer√≥n (Nurse Chuny Marquez), Troy Evans (Frank Martin), Angel Laketa Moore (Nurse Dawn Archer), Bresha Webb (Dr. Laverne St. John)

Special Appearance by: Hal Holbrook (Walter Perkins)

Co-Starring: Jaxy Boyd (Shelby Krane), Emerson Brooks (Gonzalez), Rusty Burns (Gerry), Mo Gallini (Guy), Larry Gelman (Dubin), Susan Goodwillie (Marnie), Demetrius Grosse (Newkirk), Brian Jones (Jackson), Christian Keiber (Panicali), Louie Liberti (Paramedic Bardelli), Rabbi Mark Sob El (Rabbi), Momo Yashima (Natsuki Barcenilla)

Plot Overview

A drunk, mysterious patient who comes to the ER threatens everyone's safety; Moretti returns and tries to apologize to Luka for the damage he caused to Luka & Abby's marriage; Pratt prepares for his interview for the position of Chief Resident; towards the end of the episode, an ambulance explodes with Pratt or Sam possibly inside of it.
